init.desc: Initalises the given guild with the bot if it hasn't already been.

options.--unhide: Specify the role ID of the "Unhide" role.

isInit.desc: Checks if the given guild has been initialised.

options.--id: The ID of the server to check.

create.desc: Create a category set with the given name.

list.desc: Lists all the category sets in the guild.

options.-a: Lists all category sets in every guild.
